metadata.name: ofoid Right Now [1 of 2]
metadata.description:
Watch as the timer rotates in a soothing cadence, echoing the position of the sun.

Right Now is a dynamic NFT that connects the viewer with the ever-present moment. This piece explores mortality, mindfulness, and the cascade of sensations that arise from being present. 

The viewer is encouraged to watch as the artwork changes throughout the day. Special messages are revealed to those who are most patient. It is in this process of waiting and observing that the power and potential of human awareness is fully experienced.
